title: THE MYSTIC LAWFIRM
description: Radha, a 25-year-old job hunter, is finally accepted as an assistant lawyer at a law firm run by heavenly beings. Mr Sudama, Radha's senior, has a mysterious past connected to her previous life. The law firm mainly deals with afterlife cases which help a soul enter heaven. This is the story of how Radha gets entangled in the matter of heavenly beings and what was the hidden agenda of the law firm in employing her.
author: Shyambala -
